author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR modernizes VolumeBasedMagneticFieldESProducer as part of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/26748 by
- Moving contents of header to source
- Removing ParameterSet member
- Using MessageLogger instead of `cout`
- Using ESGetToken

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.
title: Modernize VolumeBasedMagneticFieldESProducer
